00049 /* Added a category to NSString including a function to correctly escape any arguments sent to 
00050    Engage, so that there are no errors when sending a json structure to rpxnow's api */
00051 @interface NSString (NSString_URL_ESCAPING)
00052 - (NSString*)URLEscaped;
00053 @end
